attributes.action: Improve and enhance regulations on the trades of highly hazardous chemicals.
attributes.additional_details:
Acid attack: https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2017/apr/08/two-year-old-boy-and-parents-suffer-burns-after-acid-attack-in-north-london

Number of acid attack doubled: https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2015/sep/30/acid-attack-hospital-admissions-have-almost-doubled-in-last-10-years
attributes.background: It was reported by the Guardians that an acid attack on a Chinese family had happened on Saturday, 8 April. Further reports suggested that the number of acid attacks almost doubled over the past ten years. It is the lack of regulations allowing criminals to easily obtain such hazadrous chemicals.
